metadata.synopsis: Civilian waiting to go to Upper City

0.speaker: Grace Flamm
0.text: I've never seen the Flaming Fist so on edge - what's gotten into them?
0.context: NodeContext: Hushed/afraid of being overheard by the Fists

1.speaker: Grace Flamm
1.text: One of the Fists almost broke someone's jaw earlier - all they did was ask how long the wait was.
1.context: NodeContext: Hushed/afraid of being overheard by the Fists
